body_text:
How does "The Disappearance of Nagato Yuki-chan" relate to the Haruhi Suzumiya series? MAL's page on The Disappearance of Nagato Yuki-chan lists it as a spin-off for both The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya and The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya (2009).
How exactly does the new series relate to the others?
Where does it fall into the timeline?
Or is it completely independent aside from using the same characters - in which case, can it be watched without previously having watched any of the older series?
What is gap moe? I often hear the word gap moe, but I do not know what it means. So what does the word gap moe mean?
